name: Need for Beats
description:
This game was made in 4 days for GMC Jam 40: https://forum.yoyogames.com/index.php?threads/gmc-jam-40-games-topic-enter-here....

The theme was "One Big Party" and that's what this game is about: but you are the DJ and you must keep the party going!

WARNING: Proceed with caution as this game is certified HARD.

Credits:

Art by BlaineTanuki: https://twitter.com/BlaineTanuki
Music by @bjulinmusic on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/bjulinmusic/
